thread.title: New Prime Minister odds: Latest odds as Boris Johnson and David Davis resign

author: Daniel Milligan
title: New Prime Minister odds: Latest odds as Boris Johnson and David Davis resign
text:
Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email
The Government is in chaos after a double resignation.
David Davis savaged the Government’s approach to Brexit while dramatically quitting as the minister responsible for the UK’s departure from the European Union. He was replaced by Dominic Raab, who left his role as a housing minister.
And Boris Johnson sensationally quit as Foreign Secretary on Monday afternoon.
Now, speculation over if there will be a new Prime Minister to replace Theresa May is keeping the bookies busy. Read More
Here are the latest odds, with Ladbrokes (subject to change): Jeremy Corbyn- 5/1
